channel.title: CVE Feed for Motorola Solutions -- Vigilant Fixed LPR Coms Box (BCAV1F2-C600)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Motorola Solutions -- Vigilant Fixed LPR Coms Box (BCAV1F2-C600)

item.title: CVE-2024-38279|2024-06-13T17:00:20.515Z -- motorola%20solutions -- vigilant%20fixed%20lpr%20coms%20box%20%28bcav1f2-c600%29
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to an attacker modifying the bootloader by using custom arguments to bypass authentication and gain access to the file system and obtain password hashes.
